description.first: Sam is a web developer based in Amsterdam.
description.second: Sam brings your idea to life with

description.first: Sam studied computer science and multimedia at the University of Web Design. Years of experience have given Sam a unique angle to approach client projects.
description.second: Sam works mostly with startups and advises them on the best technology that is suitable htmlFor their project.
description.third: Sam helps you bring your vision to life with attention to detail and an unrivaled focus on quality.

portfolio.title: Stocks web app
portfolio.description: Worked with a client in the United States on a stocks web app with dark theme. The web app is accessible and performes really well on entry-level devices.

portfolio.title: Travel planner
portfolio.description: Once a year, it's time to let the place you go home and go discover. With this Travel planner, you can easily plan your next trip. So, where will you go?

portfolio.title: Sports tracker
portfolio.description: I love sports. I love to track my progress. With this sports tracker app, you can easily track your progress and unlock achievements. The unique gamification aspect makes you want to keep smashing your goals!

list.description: Sam has completely transformed the way we launch our products! What we particularly appreciate is the attention to detail and express communication. We are really happy that the whole project was completed worry-free! Thank you, Sam!
list.name: Jhon Doe

list.description: We were skeptical at first. However, Sam over delivered on our project. We are very happy and satisfied customers. Definitely recommended htmlFor startups!
list.name: Jhonatan Doe
